import {QuizData} from "./Quizz" const QuizzUI = (props) => { const SubmitHandled = ()=>{ alert ("submitted") } return( <>

{props.question}

  • {props.incorrect_answers} 1
  • {props.incorrect_answers} 2
  • {props.correct_answer} 3
  • {props.incorrect_answers} 4
) } export default QuizzUI;
